thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: mikel Tee
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 mikel Tee

author: mikel Tee
title: mikel Tee
text:
Over the last 10 years or so I have purchased many items from a China based company, either via Ebay or "direct"....as with Banggood.
The ease of their purchase system and the speed with which items are shipped to my address are all that I could ask.
My most recent purchase from Banggood was for quantity four (4) identical items, one of which was found to be defective on receipt. The quality of support and communication from Banggood staff was exceptional and the matter was resolved within hours. I was fortunate enough to be dealing with a Banggood staff member named "Athena". The abilities and command of the English language as demonstrated by this member were exceptional.
I would have no hesitation in purchasing additional items from this company.
